General.Name: Groupon Inc
General.Description: Groupon, Inc. operates a marketplace that connects consumers to merchants by offering goods and services at a discount in North America and international. The company provides deals in various categories, including beauty and wellness, and dining, as well as various types of experiences and services; and discounted and market rates for hotels, airfare, and package deals, as well as deals on various product lines, such as electronics, sporting goods, jewelry, toys, household items, and apparel. It offers its deal offerings to customers through websites; search engines; applications and mobile websites, which enable consumers to browse, purchase, manage, and redeem deals on their mobile devices; emails and push notifications; affiliate channels; social and display advertising; and offline marketing. Groupon, Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.
General.Address: 35 West Wacker Drive, Chicago, IL, United States, 60601
